title: Wheelchair Girl - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Ecchi   Mature   Romance   School Life   Seinen
tags: Caring Protagonist   Death of Loved Ones   Disabilities   Discrimination   Heartwarming   Modern Day   S*xual Abuse   Tragic Past
author: Chidori   千鳥
description:
Springtime, 3rd year of high school. 
On a hill road where Sakura flowers dance as they fall, a boy meets a girl in a wheelchair.
A Girl who can't move her legs, A girl who can't walk.
A serious but heartwarming love story.
>
